Belgian farmers to block Zeebrugge port as French protests spill over - reportsBelgian farmers outraged over rising costs, European Union environmental policies and cheap food imports plan to block access roads to the Zeebrugge container port in Belgium, financial daily De Tijd reported on Tuesday. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 07:30:43 GMT UFARBBWT5OOZAMCHJVTTKBBVI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/belgian-farmers-block-zeebrugge-port-french-protests-spill-over-reports-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
S.Korea's Yoon blocks new probe of 2022 Halloween crowd crushSouth Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol blocked on Tuesday a bill to launch a new probe into a Halloween crowd crush that killed 159 people in Seoul's Itaewon district in 2022, in a move slammed by the opposition and relatives of the victims. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 07:04:48 GMT JTJL4WYGLJKF5IOD5TCJPNSSLE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/skoreas-yoon-blocks-new-probe-2022-halloween-crowd-crush-2024-01-30/Hyunsu Yim世界亚太地区
Explainer: Why Hong Kong wants new national security lawsHong Kong's government announced on Tuesday that it hopes to swiftly pass new national security laws. A public consultation document was also released. A deadline for its eventual passage into law has yet to be announced. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 06:27:14 GMT TE6CRQLN2JJ5TK3OMCXDJCDSAA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/why-hong-kong-wants-new-national-security-laws-2024-01-30/Greg Torode, Jessie Pang世界中国
Australia the 'security partner of choice' in South Pacific - PM AlbaneseAustralia is the "security partner of choice" for neighbouring Papua New Guinea (PNG), Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Tuesday, after the biggest Pacific Island nation said China was seeking a policing and security deal. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 05:56:48 GMT GNEHU5DPOFP25EBUFJCHW4IBQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-security-partner-choice-south-pacific-pm-albanese-2024-01-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
Israel says undercover troops kill three gunmen in West Bank hospitalIsraeli commandos disguised as Palestinians killed three gunmen in a hospital in the occupied West Bank on Tuesday, the police and military said, accusing one of them of planning an imminent attack and the other two of involvement in recent violence. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 05:34:48 GMT N5UIYVH5JBK2BBVUUFB46HW5M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-forces-kill-3-gunmen-west-bank-hospital-army-says-2024-01-30/Reuters世界中东
Russia destroys 21 Ukraine-launched drones over Crimea and Russian regions -reportsRussian air defence systems destroyed or intercepted 21 Ukraine-launched drones over the Crimean Peninsula and several Russian regions, Russian news agencies reported on Tuesday, citing Moscow's defence ministry. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 05:15:03 GMT BQSBSTES2VOKVEOWYW2RABHLTY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-destroys-21-ukraine-launched-drones-over-crimea- Russian-regions-reports-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
Japan PM vows to do 'everything possible' to boost household incomeJapanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida said on Tuesday his government would do "everything possible" to achieve real income growth to put a decisive end to deflation. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 05:01:54 GMT AEP2WKZWYZK47D7HYHCZNYYPJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-pm-vows-do-everything-possible-boost-household-venue-2024-01-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
Vietnam, Philippines seal deals on South China Sea securityVietnam and the Philippines agreed on Tuesday to boost cooperation among their coastguards and to prevent untoward incidents in the South China Sea, in an announcement during a state visit to Hanoi by President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:54:16 GMT KLJJFXA7EJMHFKDPXUWFW7SPBI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/vietnam-philippines-seal-deals-south-china-sea-security-2024-01-30/Khanh Vu世界亚太地区
Hong Kong leader starts push for new security laws, says city "can't afford to wait"Hong Kong's leader confirmed on Tuesday his intention to pass tighter national security laws soon to build on sweeping legislation Beijing imposed on the city in 2020, saying the city "could not afford to wait" . Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:18:18 GMT GMDHVRQJYZLDLC752YVPL7BH4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kong-leaders-start-legislative-push-tighten-national-security-laws-2024-01-30/Jessie Pang, Greg Torode世界中国
North Korea fires cruise missiles into sea, South Korea saysThe launch comes amid a rise in tension on the Korean peninsula and follows a barrage of cruise missiles fired by Pyongyang off its east coast on Sunday. Russian shelling kills four in northern Ukraine, one in devastated AvdiivkaRussian shelling in northern Ukraine killed four people in two villages in Sumy region near the Russian border, while a woman died in a fresh assault on the devastated eastern Ukrainian town of Avdiivka, local officials said.
